jfxtras.labs.scene.layout

Class ScalableContentPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.layout.Pane
            • jfxtras.labs.scene.layout.ScalableContentPane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class ScalableContentPane
extends javafx.scene.layout.Pane

    Scales content to always fit in the bounds of this pane. Useful for workflows with lots of windows.
